rules.name: Risk Management System Exists
rules.description: Verify that a risk management system is implemented and operational

rules.name: Risk Assessment Procedures
rules.description: Verify that risk assessment procedures are documented and followed

rules.name: Data Quality Management
rules.description: Verify that data quality management procedures are implemented

rules.name: Data Processing Records
rules.description: Verify that data processing activities are properly recorded

rules.name: Technical Documentation Completeness
rules.description: Verify that technical documentation is complete and up-to-date

rules.name: Algorithm Documentation
rules.description: Verify that algorithm documentation is comprehensive

rules.name: System Operation Logs
rules.description: Verify that system operation logs are maintained

rules.name: Audit Trail Integrity
rules.description: Verify that audit trails are complete and tamper-proof

rules.name: AI Transparency Notices
rules.description: Verify that AI transparency notices are displayed to users

rules.name: User Information Provision
rules.description: Verify that users are provided with adequate information about AI system

rules.name: Human Oversight Mechanisms
rules.description: Verify that human oversight mechanisms are implemented

rules.name: Override Capabilities
rules.description: Verify that human override capabilities are functional

rules.name: System Accuracy
rules.description: Verify that system accuracy meets requirements

rules.name: Cybersecurity Measures
rules.description: Verify that cybersecurity measures are implemented
